article.name: touch-of-the-grave
article.contents:
--- class: Touch of the Grave name: Kiss of Death school: Death rank: 1 ---
At-will, std, touch, 1 Mana; you infuse target with negative energy, harming them in the manner of an undead creature. Choose one effect: - '''Shadow's Grasp:''' Medium necrotic damage plus [Weakened](../../../system/conditions/weakened.md), Con ends. - '''Wraith's Touch:''' Medium necrotic damage plus [Frail](../../../system/conditions/frail.md), Con ends. - '''Ghostly Visage:''' Medium necrotic damage plus [Meek](../../../system/conditions/meek.md), Con ends.
